titleStmt.title: Anthologia : the life & death of Mr Samuel Crook late pastor of Wrington in Sommerset-shire, who being dead, yet speaketh. By W.G. An eye and ear-witness of both.
titleStmt.author: Garrett, William, d. 1674 or 5.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by James Flesher, for Philemon Stephens, at the sign of the gilded Lion in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: The first word in the title is in Greek characters.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the gilded Lion in Pauls Church-yard
